Package gobblin.cluster

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContainerMetrics
    Extension of GobblinMetrics specifically for GobblinTaskRunners.
    GobblinClusterConfigurationKeys
    A central place for configuration related constants of a Gobblin Cluster.
    GobblinClusterManager
    The central cluster manager for Gobblin Clusters.
    GobblinClusterMetricTagNames
    A central place for constants of MetricContext tag names for a Gobblin cluster.
    GobblinClusterUtils  
    GobblinHelixConstants
    Class for defining constants used while interacting with Helix
    GobblinHelixJob
    An implementation of a Quartz's Job that uses a GobblinHelixJobLauncher to launch a Gobblin job.
    GobblinHelixJobLauncher
    An implementation of JobLauncher that launches a Gobblin job using the Helix task framework.
    GobblinHelixJobScheduler
    An extension to JobScheduler that schedules and runs Gobblin jobs on Helix using GobblinHelixJobLaunchers.
    GobblinHelixMessagingService
    #HELIX-0.6.7-WORKAROUND The GobblinHelixMessagingService is a temporary workaround for missing messaging support for INSTANCES in helix 0.6.7
    GobblinHelixMessagingService.GobblinHelixCriteriaEvaluator  
    GobblinHelixTask
    An implementation of Helix's Task that wraps and runs one or more Gobblin Tasks.
    GobblinHelixTaskDriver
    #HELIX-0.6.7-WORKAROUND Replacement TaskDriver methods to workaround bugs and changes in behavior for the 0.6.7 upgrade
    GobblinHelixTaskFactory
    An implementation of Helix's TaskFactory for GobblinHelixTasks.
    GobblinHelixTaskStateTracker
    A concrete extension to AbstractTaskStateTracker for a Gobblin Cluster.
    GobblinTaskRunner
    The main class running in the containers managing services for running Gobblin WorkUnits.
    GobblinTaskStateModel
    A state model for a Gobblin task that implements all supported state transitions.
    GobblinTaskStateModelFactory
    A TaskStateModelFactory for GobblinTaskStateModels.
    HelixUtils
    A utility class for working with Gobblin on Helix.
    JobConfigurationManager
    A class for managing Gobblin job configurations.
    NoopReplyHandler
    Class that handles Helix messaging response via no-op.
    ScheduledJobConfigurationManager  
    StreamingJobConfigurationManager
    A JobConfigurationManager that fetches job specs from a SpecExecutorInstanceConsumer in a loop without
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HelixMessageSubTypes
    An enumeration of Helix message sub types.
